originContent: Command line tool to keep track of your favorite playlists on YouTube and many other places.
translatedContent: Outil en ligne de commande pour suivre vos playlists préférées sur YouTube et bien d'autres endroits.

originContent: Alternative installation methods are described in the [documentation](https://github.com/woefe/ytcc/tree/master/doc/install.md).
translatedContent: Des méthodes d'installation alternatives sont décrites dans la [documentation](https://github.com/woefe/ytcc/tree/master/doc/install.md).

originContent: Note that `subscribe` does not save discovered videos to the database.
translatedContent: Notez que `subscribe` n'enregistre pas les vidéos découvertes dans la base de données.

originContent: Run `ytcc update` to check and fetch video metadata after subscribing.
translatedContent: Exécutez `ytcc update` pour vérifier et récupérer les métadonnées des vidéos après l'abonnement.

originContent: # Any playlist supported by yt-dlp (or youtube-dl)
translatedContent: # Any playlist supported by yt-dlp (or youtube-dl)
*Astuce* : Lors de la demande d’un takeout, assurez-vous de ne sélectionner que les données YouTube, sinon le takeout pourrait prendre beaucoup de temps à se terminer.

originContent: *Hint*: When requesting a takeout make sure to select only the YouTube data, otherwise the takeout might take quite long to complete.

translatedContent: Récupérer les métadonnées des nouvelles vidéos.
Lister le contenu de la playlist au format JSON.

originContent: List playlist content in JSON format.

translatedContent: Listez toutes les vidéos sous forme de flux RSS.

originContent: List all videos as RSS feed.

translatedContent: Marquer toutes les vidéos d'une playlist comme regardées sans les lire.

originContent: Mark all videos of a playlist as watched without playing them.

translatedContent: Écoutez de la musique sans aucune limitation.

originContent: Listen to some music without limitations.

translatedContent: **Interface terminal alternative avec prise en charge des vignettes.**

originContent: Requires [fzf](https://github.com/junegunn/fzf) version 0.23.1 or newer, optionally [curl](https://curl.se/) and either [ueberzug](https://github.com/seebye/ueberzug) or [kitty](https://sw.kovidgoyal.net/kitty/).
translatedContent: Nécessite [fzf](https://github.com/junegunn/fzf) version 0.23.1 ou plus récente, éventuellement [curl](https://curl.se/) et soit [ueberzug](https://github.com/seebye/ueberzug) ou [kitty](https://sw.kovidgoyal.net/kitty/).

originContent: The script is automatically installed on most platforms during installation of ytcc.
translatedContent: Le script est automatiquement installé sur la plupart des plateformes lors de l'installation de ytcc.

originContent: If it's not installed, you can download it from [here](https://github.com/woefe/ytcc/tree/master/scripts/ytccf.sh).
translatedContent: S'il n'est pas installé, vous pouvez le télécharger depuis [ici](https://github.com/woefe/ytcc/tree/master/scripts/ytccf.sh).

originContent: Ytcc searches for a configuration file at the following locations:
translatedContent: Ytcc recherche un fichier de configuration aux emplacements suivants :

originContent: 1. The file given with `-c` or `--config` options
translatedContent: 1. Le fichier indiqué avec les options `-c` ou `--config`

originContent: If no config file is found in these locations, a default config file is created at `$XDG_CONFIG_HOME/ytcc/ytcc.conf` or `~/.config/ytcc/ytcc.conf`
translatedContent: Si aucun fichier de configuration n’est trouvé à ces emplacements, un fichier de configuration par défaut est créé à `$XDG_CONFIG_HOME/ytcc/ytcc.conf` ou `~/.config/ytcc/ytcc.conf`

originContent: # Directory where downloads are saved, when --path is not given
translatedContent: # Directory where downloads are saved, when --path is not given

originContent: # Downloads videos to subdirectories by playlist name. If a video is on multiple playlists, ytcc
translatedContent: # Downloads videos to subdirectories by playlist name. If a video is on multiple playlists, ytcc

originContent: # will download the video only to one subdirectory and symlink it to the other subdirectories.
translatedContent: # will download the video only to one subdirectory and symlink it to the other subdirectories.

originContent: # Parameters passed to mpv. Adjusting these might break video playback in ytcc!
translatedContent: # Parameters passed to mpv. Adjusting these might break video playback in ytcc!

originContent: # Defines the order of video listings.
translatedContent: # Defines the order of video listings.

originContent: # Possible options: id, url, title, description, publish_date, watched, duration, extractor_hash,
translatedContent: # Possible options: id, url, title, description, publish_date, watched, duration, extractor_hash,

originContent: # playlists. Every option must be suffixed with :desc or :asc for descending or ascending sort.
translatedContent: # playlists. Every option must be suffixed with :desc or :asc for descending or ascending sort.

originContent: # Default attributes shown in video listings.
translatedContent: # Default attributes shown in video listings.

originContent: # Some ytcc commands allow overriding the default set here in the config.
translatedContent: # Some ytcc commands allow overriding the default set here in the config.

originContent: video_attrs = id, title, publish_date, duration, playlists
translatedContent: video_attrs = id, title, publish_date, duration, playlists

originContent: # Default attributes shown in playlist/subscription listings.
translatedContent: # Default attributes shown in playlist/subscription listings.

originContent: # Some ytcc commands allow overriding the default set here in the config.
translatedContent: # Some ytcc commands allow overriding the default set here in the config.

originContent: # Path where the database is stored.
translatedContent: # Path where the database is stored.

originContent: # Can be used to sync the database between multiple machines.
translatedContent: # Can be used to sync the database between multiple machines.

originContent: # The format of used to print dates
translatedContent: # The format of used to print dates

originContent: # Default failure threshold before a video is ignored.
translatedContent: # Default failure threshold before a video is ignored.

originContent: # When a video could not be updated repeatedly, it will be ignored by ytcc after `max_update_fail`
translatedContent: # When a video could not be updated repeatedly, it will be ignored by ytcc after `max_update_fail`

originContent: # attempts. This setting can be overridden with the --max-fail commandline parameter.
translatedContent: # attempts. This setting can be overridden with the --max-fail commandline parameter.

originContent: # The update command will only check the first `max_update_backlog` videos of a playlist to improve
translatedContent: # The update command will only check the first `max_update_backlog` videos of a playlist to improve

originContent: # performance. This setting can be overridden with the --max-backlog commandline parameter.
translatedContent: # performance. This setting can be overridden with the --max-backlog commandline parameter.

originContent: # Ignore videos that have an age limit higher than the one specified here.
translatedContent: # Ignore videos that have an age limit higher than the one specified here.

originContent: # Prompt and table colors. Supports 256 colors. Hence, values between 0-255 are allowed.
translatedContent: # Prompt and table colors. Supports 256 colors. Hence, values between 0-255 are allowed.

originContent: # The characters to use for selecting videos in interactive mode.
translatedContent: # The characters to use for selecting videos in interactive mode.

originContent: # Possible options: play_video, play_audio, mark_watched, download_audio, download_video
translatedContent: # Possible options: play_video, play_audio, mark_watched, download_audio, download_video

originContent: # Format (see FORMAT SELECTION in yt-dlp manpage). Make sure to use a video format here, if you
translatedContent: # Format (see FORMAT SELECTION in yt-dlp manpage). Make sure to use a video format here, if you

originContent: # want to be able to download videos.
translatedContent: # want to be able to download videos.

originContent: # Output template (see OUTPUT TEMPLATE in yt-dlp manpage).
translatedContent: # Output template (see OUTPUT TEMPLATE in yt-dlp manpage).

originContent: # Note that the output template will be prefixed with the `download_dir` directory and the name of
translatedContent: # Note that the output template will be prefixed with the `download_dir` directory and the name of

originContent: # If a merge is required according to format selection, merge to the given container format.
translatedContent: # If a merge is required according to format selection, merge to the given container format.

originContent: # One of mkv, mp4, ogg, webm, flv
translatedContent: # One of mkv, mp4, ogg, webm, flv

originContent: # Limit download speed to the given bytes/second. Set 0 for no limit.
translatedContent: # Limit download speed to the given bytes/second. Set 0 for no limit.

originContent: # E.g. limit to one megabyte per second
translatedContent: # E.g. limit to one megabyte per second

originContent: # Set number of retries before giving up on a download.
translatedContent: # Set number of retries before giving up on a download.

originContent: # If enabled and available, automatic and manual subtitles for selected languages are embedded in
translatedContent: # If enabled and available, automatic and manual subtitles for selected languages are embedded in

originContent: # Embed the youtube thumbnail in audio downloads.
translatedContent: # Embed the youtube thumbnail in audio downloads.

originContent: # Transforms the resulting file to m4a, if enabled.
translatedContent: # Transforms the resulting file to m4a, if enabled.

originContent: # Don't download videos longer than 'max_duration' seconds.
translatedContent: # Don't download videos longer than 'max_duration' seconds.

originContent: # Restrict filenames to only ASCII characters and avoid "&" and spaces in filenames.
translatedContent: # Restrict filenames to only ASCII characters and avoid "&" and spaces in filenames.
Ytcc utilise [mpv](https://mpv.io) pour lire les vidéos.

originContent: You can configure mpv to integrate nicely with ytcc.
translatedContent: Vous pouvez configurer mpv pour une intégration optimale avec ytcc.

originContent: Create a new issue on the [GitHub issue tracker](https://github.com/woefe/ytcc/issues/new).
translatedContent: Créez un nouveau problème sur le [suivi des problèmes GitHub](https://github.com/woefe/ytcc/issues/new).

originContent: Describe the issue as detailed as possible, and please use the issue templates, if possible!
translatedContent: Décrivez le problème aussi précisément que possible, et veuillez utiliser les modèles de problème, si possible !

originContent: **Important**: Remember to include the output of `ytcc bug-report` in bug reports.
translatedContent: **Important** : N’oubliez pas d’inclure la sortie de `ytcc bug-report` dans les rapports de bugs.

originContent: It also might help a lot to run ytcc with the `--loglevel debug` option and include the output in your report.
translatedContent: Il peut aussi être très utile d’exécuter ytcc avec l’option `--loglevel debug` et d’inclure la sortie dans votre rapport.
Exécutez les commandes suivantes avant chaque demande de tirage et corrigez les avertissements ou erreurs qu'elles produisent.

originContent: Run the following commands before every pull request and fix the warnings or errors they produce.

translatedContent: - [ffmpeg](https://ffmpeg.org/) pour la fusion de fichiers `.mp4` ou `.mkv`

originContent: - [mpv](https://mpv.io/), if you want to play audio or video
translatedContent: - [mpv](https://mpv.io/), si vous souhaitez lire de l’audio ou de la vidéo

originContent: Requirements for the ytccf.sh bash script:
translatedContent: Exigences pour le script bash ytccf.sh :
- Optionnellement, pour la prise en charge des vignettes
